game_description: XR Guru caters the diverse needs of the present education system. XR Guru is an interactive and immersive learning application. The purpose of the app is to simplify visually complex topics as illustrative and instructional 3D content
review_2: Alot of work for that. You can't just input a fake name and give it bill gates email address like most other apps. Once your in, there is only a few lessons to learn from, and the technology on display isn't very scintillating.
